ygData.subject: Re: learning Elder Dragon sounds painful
ygData.msgSnippet: I m guessing the hard way would be to find a pretty mean dragon (I m guessing not all dragons speak elder).  Then hang around him?  Not sure how long it takes
ygData.messageBody:
I'm guessing the hard way would be to find a pretty mean dragon (I'm
guessing not all dragons speak elder). Then hang around him? Not sure
how long it takes to pick up language from "ambient" sounds. The other
way would be to find someone in game who has raised their skill enough
in elder dragon to teach it to you. I can imagine that might be an
expensive lesson either way. :)

Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: William Greene [mailto:wrg@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 8:44 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Virus spreading has NO place anywhere


Anyone know how or where i might begin to learn Elder Dragon?
